name: pwtr

body.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wtr(cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wtr(cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(c0)), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wtr(cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(c0)), c0)

|- wb(wtr(c0), wtr(cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cpw(c0)), cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))

comment: A class is transitive iff its power class is transitive. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2014.)
